about_the_game: This is an episodic game and is the third episode of this season. The story follows after the events in episode 2. Alex Summer (Shadow) goes to F.B.I headquarter disguised as a lawyer  to kill James, a member of the syndicate who is ratting her out. Your job is to kill James and escape from F.B.I agents and cop. After reaching home you have to fight a group of assailants to survive. You can use the mouse pointer to aim and click the mouse button to shoot. The up arrow key can be used to go forward and down arrow key to go back. You can use the mouse to turn left and right. Descriptions of the other controls will be given before each level.

short_description: After shadow kills James, she shoots her way out of the F.B.I headquarter and escapes from cops after a police pursuit only to realize that all her dreams of starting a new life is crushed when she sees the dead body of Mike, her boyfriend. Then she fights with the assailants to survive.
